entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -43.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 07:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -43.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -62
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: N 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 62 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
